summary: LAST YEAR THEY DID AN EMISSIONS UPDATE ON MY TRUCK. SINCE THEN THERE IS TERRIBLE ACCELERATOR PEDAL LAG. I ALREADY HAD A DOZEN OR MORE CLOSE CALLS WHEN TRYING TO PULL INTO TRAFFIC. IT TAKES LITERALLY 2-3 SECONDS AFTER I PRESS THE ACCELERATOR FOR THE TRUCK TO START MOVING. IT MAKES DRIVING THE TRUCK DANGEROUS IN HIGH TRAFFIC AREAS.
